text: Prechistoye () is an urban locality (a work settlement) and the administrative center of Pervomaysky District of Yaroslavl Oblast, Russia. Population: ==History== In the village there is the Uspensky Cathedral, built in 1798-1801 by the means of parishioners. There is a museum of local lore and woods, located in the former shop of merchant Sveshnikov.Станислав Рябинин. Тайны леса из купеческого дома // Торговая газета, № 31-32 (321—322), 12 May 2006 The People's Theater operates and was founded in 1918.Репортаж о театре ЯрГТРК ==Notable people== *Aleksandr Petrov (animator) ==References== Category:Urban- type settlements in Yaroslavl Oblast
title: Prechistoye, Pervomaysky District, Yaroslavl Oblast
